definition: to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: Put some greenery along the mantle to soften the edge a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 沿着壁爐架擺放了一些綠葉以使邊線看起來柔和一點。

sentences.english: On the mantel were photographs of a man and a woman.
sentences.chinese: 壁爐架上面是一對男女的一些照片。

sentences.english: That's a mantelpiece cluttered up with all kinds of doodad .
sentences.chinese: 那是個擺滿了各種小玩意兒的壁爐架。

sentences.english: Lady Catherine's drawing rooms costs eight hundred pounds.
sentences.chinese: 甚至凱瑟琳夫人一個畫室的壁爐架就價值八百英鎊。

sentences.english: There was a little heraldic chair by the chimney-piece .
sentences.chinese: 壁爐架旁邊有一把印有紋章的小椅子。

sentences.english: He set the glass on the mantel .
sentences.chinese: 他把玻璃杯放在壁爐架上。

sentences.english: I heard him knock his pipe out on the mantelpiece.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見他在壁爐架上磕打菸斗。

sentences.english: Hareton, I'll leave this book upon the chimney-piece, and I'll bring some more tomorrow.'
sentences.chinese: 哈里頓，我把這本書放在爐架上，我明天再拿點來。

sentences.english: She centered the clock on the mantelpiece.
sentences.chinese: 她將時鐘放在壁爐架正中央。

sentences.english: Be careful not to strike your head against the mantel.
sentences.chinese: 小心不要使你的頭撞到壁爐架。

sentences.english: I heard him knock out his pipe on the mantelpiece.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見他在壁爐架上磕打菸斗。

sentences.english: I glare up at the family photos on the mantel, over the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 我擡頭怒視壁爐架上的家庭照片，就在壁爐的上方。

sentences.english: The Bishop's candlesticks were in their place on the chimney-piece.
sentences.chinese: 主教的蠟燭臺仍放在壁爐架上。

sentences.english: That is one of my paintings over the chimney-piece.
sentences.chinese: 壁爐架上的那幅畫就是我畫的。

sentences.english: Even the chimney-piece in one of Lady Catherine's drawing rooms costs eight hundred pounds.
sentences.chinese: 甚至凱瑟琳夫人一個畫室的壁爐架就價值八百英鎊。

sentences.english: He had thrust his chest out, supporting his shoulders against the mantel .
sentences.chinese: 他挺起胸脯，肩膊抵着壁爐架。
